name: thrust-engine
author: Hayesmaker Media Ltd @hayes_maker

scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.pretest: npm config set travis_build && echo 'Starting tests' && npm run jshint
scripts.test: npm run test:units && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build: npm run browserify:test && npm run browserify:app
scripts.postbuild: npm run uglify && npm run yuidoc
scripts.heroku: echo 'Deploying to heroku master' && git push heroku master
scripts.build:test: npm run browserify:app && npm run browserify:test && npm test
scripts.nightwatch: echo 'Attempting Local Nightwatch test sweep' && cd test/e2e/nightwatch && nightwatch && cd ../../..
scripts.mocha: echo 'Attempting to run mocha bdd style unit tests' && mocha-phantomjs ./public/javascripts/test/index.html
scripts.e2e:local: echo 'Attempting Local Browserstack test sweep' && cd test/e2e/nightwatch && nightwatch -c nightwatch.json -e browserstack && cd ../../..
scripts.e2e:travis: echo 'Travis attempting Browserstack test sweep' && cd test/e2e/nightwatch && nightwatch -c nightwatch.json -e travis && cd ../../..

description: Thrust: an awesome 8 bit physics based puzzle/blaster.  Thrust-Engine: A Canvas based HTML5 game engine for making games similar to Thrust
